00053 OM_uint32 Gss_release_buffer ( OM_uint32 * minor_status, gss_buffer_t buffer )
00054 {
00055     if (minor_status)
00056         *minor_status = 0;
00057 
00058     /* if buffer is NULL, return */
00059 
00060     if (buffer == GSS_C_NO_BUFFER)
00061         return(GSS_S_COMPLETE);
00062 
00063     if ((buffer->length) &&
00064         (buffer->value))
00065      {
00066         Mem_Free(buffer->value); 
00067         buffer->length = 0;
00068         buffer->value = NULL;
00069      }
00070 
00071     return (GSS_S_COMPLETE);
00072 } /* Gss_release_buffer */
